io.name: TCISCTCF0011404_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISCTCF0011404_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISCTCF0011404_inbound"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="searchGroup" type="tns:SEARCH_GROUP_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>검색_그룹</documentation> <appinfo> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SEARCH_GROUP_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="crdNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="개인일 경우 주민번호, 법인일 경우 사업자번호 등록한다." /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="Y" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="16" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="blCd"> <annotation> <documentation>BL코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="BLACK LIST고객이나 카드를 관리한다." /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="lstngStoreCd"> <annotation> <documentation>등재점코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="등재점코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="blTskGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>BL업무구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="BL코드(업무별 관리)" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="blTypeCd"> <annotation> <documentation>BL유형코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="BL등록하는 유형을 관리한다." /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="regDtm1"> <annotation> <documentation>등록일시1</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="등록일시" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="14" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="regDtm2"> <annotation> <documentation>등록일시2</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="등록일시" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="14" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISCTCF0011404_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISCTCF0011404_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISCTCF0011404_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="gridDataPagerowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>그리드_데이터_원페이지당조회건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" />
